3. Core modules¶

The following modules are used for internal and external use.

  • 3.1. sesame – Top level package
  • 3.2. sesame.builder – High level construction of systems
  • 3.3. sesame.solvers – Equilibrium and nonequilibrium solvers
  • 3.4. sesame.observables – Computing densities, currents and recombination
  • 3.5. sesame.utils – Miscellaneous routines
